introduction: Improve your English vocabulary and listening in just six minutes! Smart technology is becoming more

vocabulary.example: The intermittent rain showers made it difficult to plan the outdoor event.

vocabulary.definition: periods of time without energy, such as electricity
vocabulary.example: During the storm, the city experienced frequent blackouts due to power outages.

vocabulary.definition: the process by which computers learn and change behavior based on data
vocabulary.example: Machine learning algorithms are used in predicting customer behavior based on past interactions.
Engineers used software to simulate the airflow around the airplane wings to optimize its design.
